body_html:
@soichih I must've entered the duplicate issue number wrong. This particular segfault has been fixed with 0.4.0 and 0.4.1 releases. The underlying issue was wrt statically linking libstdc++ and we no longer do that.

It's likely you have a different issue than this one.

body:
@soichih I must've entered the duplicate issue number wrong. This particular segfault has been fixed with `0.4.0` and `0.4.1` releases. The underlying issue was wrt statically linking libstdc++ and we no longer do that.

It's likely you have a different issue than this one.
